**Signature:**


## Properties

| Property                                                                                    | Modifiers | Type          | Description                                                              |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [cancelButtonLabel?](./extensions.modalfootercomponentprops.cancelbuttonlabel.md)           |           | string        | _(Optional)_ Label for the Cancel button of the Modal.                   |
